CompileFlags.description:
Flag lists to be added or removed
https://clangd.llvm.org/config.html#compileflags

Add.description:
Flags to be added to the compile command
https://clangd.llvm.org/config.html#add

Remove.description:
Flags to be removed from the compile command
https://clangd.llvm.org/config.html#remove

CompilationDatabase.description:
A directory to search for compilation database
https://clangd.llvm.org/config.html#compilationdatabase

Index.description: Controls how clangd understands code outside the current file.

Background.description: Whether files are built in the background to produce a project index. This is checked for translation units only, not headers they include.

External.description: Used to define an external index source

Style.description: Describes the style of the codebase, beyond formatting

Suppress.description: Diagnostic codes that should be suppressed.

ClangTidy.description: Configure how clang-tidy runs over your files. The settings are merged with any settings found in .clang-tidy configuration files with the ones from clangd configs taking precedence.

Add.description: List of checks to enable, can be globs.

Remove.description: List of checks to disable, can be globs.

CheckOptions.description: Key-value pairs of options for clang-tidy checks

UnusedIncludes.description: Enables Include Cleaner's unused includes diagnostics.

AllScopes.description: Whether code completion should include suggestions from scopes that are not visible. The required scope prefix will be inserted.

InlayHints.description: Configures the behaviour of the inlay-hints feature.

Enabled.description: A boolean that enables/disables the inlay-hints feature for all kinds, when disabled, configuration for specific kinds are ignored.

ParameterNames.description: A boolean that enables/disables inlay-hints for parameter names in function calls.

DeducedTypes.description: A boolean that enables/disables inlay-hints for deduced types.

Hover.description: Configures contents of the hover cards.

ShowAKA.description: A boolean that controls printing of desugared types e.g: `vector<int>::value_type (aka int)`
